sentences.en: As lead singer, Michael's schedule was more onerous than that of his brothers.
sentences.cn: 主唱迈克尔·杰克逊的工作甚至比兄弟们更加繁重.

sentences.en: But the scope and cost of data warehouse efforts were frequently onerous.
sentences.cn: 但是数据仓库工作的范围和成本常常是巨大的.

sentences.en: For Barack Obama, the calm looks likely to be especially onerous.
sentences.cn: 对于贝拉克-奥巴马, 危机后的平静尤为让人担忧.

sentences.en: I've always led an onerous timetable but I like it.
sentences.cn: 我的日程安排的确很紧,但我喜欢这样.

sentences.en: Increasing demand is not an onerous duty. Consuming more is hardly a chore.
sentences.cn: 扩大需求并非繁重的责任, 增加消费也算不上苦差.

sentences.en: Its three - wheel design exempts it from onerous federal testing regulations.
sentences.cn: 它的三轮设计使它不用再受繁杂的联邦机动车测试规定的约束.

sentences.en: My duties weren't onerous; I only had to greet the guests.
sentences.cn: 我的工作负担不重; 我只需要迎接客人.

sentences.en: My household duties were not particularly onerous.
None of these restrictions impose a really onerous burden on short - sellers.
sentences.cn: 所有这些限制,实际都没给空头施加太重的负担.

sentences.en: Overtime work is often onerous, though it is well paid.
sentences.cn: 尽管有好的报酬,加班工作常常很繁重.

sentences.en: Shall there be a free port in one State and onerous duties in another?
sentences.cn: 会有在一州的港口不征税在另一州的港口征收重税的情形 吗 ?

sentences.en: The aid, while large , won't be onerous.

sentences.en: The job had become reduced quickly to its onerous humiliating routine.
sentences.cn: 他的工作很快就缩小到只剩些烦琐的例行公事,干着也觉得很不光彩.

sentences.en: The proposed rules may be unrealistic as well as onerous.
sentences.cn: 草拟的规则也许不太现实而且冗赘.

sentences.en: This is the most onerous task I have ever undertaken . Your arrival was most opportune.
